title: BARD - A Pleasant Conversation
itunes:title: BARD - A Pleasant Conversation
description:
Mark and Adam discuss Adam's recent Bill Maher interview that's been gaining steam online as well as the ongoing confirmation hearings of Supreme Court Nominee Ketanji Brown Jackson

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
